name: VR Stunt Car Racing Adventure
description:
Are you really a fan of racing in Virtual Reality??
If yes, then fasten your seat belts and enjoy the most exciting journey with smoothy race track going through bridges, green meadows and huge castles. Experience the sensation of fantasy land in virtual reality using your mobile phone. Download and enjoy the ultimate adventure of ups and downs of a dangerous curvy track.

How to Play:
- you should have gyro sensors in your smart phone.
- insert your device into VR Glasses or Google Cardboard
- your are free to look left/right and front/backward
- use revolving chair or stand in open place.

Features:
- beautiful stunning graphics
- gyro meter based 360 degree rotation
- full 3D view
- there is no time limit unlimited play and fun
